example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how a fig element can associate a title and a description with an image.
example.codeblock: <fig> <title>The handshake</title> <desc>This image shows two hands clasped in a formal, business-like handshake.</desc> <image href="59j0p66.jpg"> <alt>A handshake</alt> </image> </fig>
